title: LendrNetwork
author: LendrNetwork
content: https://lendr.network/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/LendrUSRE-1.pngLendr Network - Earn Money Lending Real World Asset Stablecoins with 0% Interest LoansLendr Network is a Real World Assets (RWA) stablecoin protocol offering interest-free defi loans on unique, inflation-proof stablecoins.LendrUSRE (USRE) is the world’s first stablecoin pegged to the US real estate market. USRE earns the same returns as the US real estate market plus additional returns from DeFi lending and crypto exposure.Our Quick Start Guide videos will show you how to start building generational wealth with USRE in less than 5 minutes.⭐ Stablecoins:LendrUSRE (USRE) is a stablecoin pegged to the US real estate market.LendrUSD (USDL) is an inflation-proof USD stablecoin pegged to the U.S. inflation index. (Launching Soon)LendrGold (LGLD) is a stablecoin pegged to the global gold market. (Launching Soon)⭐ Features:All Lendr Network stablecoins are decentralized, governance-free,Backed using 110%+ on-chain collateral (ETH)Defi lending application is live now!0% Buy/Sell fees on all tokensStaking is unlocked with no entry or exit fees100% of the revenue sent to stakers⭐ Security:Protocol audits by Certik, Immunefi, Solidproof, and more. 2x bug bounty systems are live. The team has previously created staking pools for protocols which have safely handled over 12,000,000 USD of user funds. ⭐ Project Links:Quick Start Guide: https://lendr.network/how-it-works/LendrUSRE Product Page: https://lendr.network/lendrusre/Website: https://lendr.networkApplication: https://ldre.lendr.networkTwitter: https://twitter.com/lendrnetworkTelegram: https://t.me/lendrnetworkWhitepaper: https://whitepaper.lendr.network/
